content: The night was dark and stormy. Three robbers sat in a cave. Said one to another. Bill, tell us a story. And this is how it began.
translations: ita:La notte era buia e tempestosa. Tre ladri sedevano in una grotta. Disse uno all'altroï¹• Bill, raccontaci una storia. E co
